name: JingleJam
description:
Race against your opponent to collect as many gifts as you can, while avoiding the onslaught of reindeer everywhere! Steal your opponent's gift to earn double the points! This game was created in 3 days for the  Zeno Jam 4 with the theme "I Am Everywhere".

This game is preferably played as a local 2 player game, but there's also a single player mode using a simple bot AI.  Asset pack used: https://franuka.itch.io/rpg-snow-tileset

On top of the controls listed in-game, you can also press escape or space to pause the game.
